body.name: USHINING 4G Unlocked Flip Phone for Senior with Speed Talk SIM Card Seniors Cell Phone SOS Big Button Senior Basic Phone for Elderly 2.4 Inch Screen Unlocked Feature Phone with Charging Dock (Red)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 14 hrs 39 mins
features: 【SpeedTalk SIM】Ushining Senior cell phone come with a SpeedTalk SIM Card, minimum cost only $5 per month, option for Port-in(Keep) your existing phone number or get a new phone number.

【Built for Seniors】USHINING 4G senior flip phone, easy to use operation system, 2.4 inch screen with big menu icon, large font, high volume and high-definition loudspeakers, equipped with a charging dock, very convenient for the elderly when charge the phone.

【Practical Shortcut Keys】this senior feature phone has a SOS button on the rear cover for emergency call, preset 5 emergency contacts, allowing you immediately dialing to a preferred contact number in case of an emergency. Ideal for seniors, children or people with disabilities. 2-9 Speed dial buttons(Dedicated Direct dial keys)

【Practical Functions】blacklist, 30M powerful flashlight, external FM Radio, alarm clock, audio player, calculator, calendar, Bluetooth, dual flashlight, 6 language: English, Dutch, Spanish,Portuguese, French and Italian.

【Ultra long standby】Low power consumption design,1000mAh batteries provides 5-6 hours talk time or standby time over 100 hours (4 days). Convenient charging base, plug and charge,easy to use for the elderly.

【4G LTE network】This senior 4G basic cell phone is compatible with T-Mobile(Prepaid Plan), MetroPCS, Tello Mobile, Ultra Mobile, SpeedTalk, Simple Mobile, Mint Mobile, Red Pocket(GSMT) and any other carriers that using T-Mobile service; NOT for CDMA Carriers (Verizon, Sprint, Boost, PagePlus) or AT&T.

productInformation.name: Whats in the box
productInformation.value: Speedtalk SIM Card*1, Battery*1, User Manual*1, Charger*1,Charging Dock*1, Phone*1

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pre purchase instructions How to Use A New SIM Card on Our Phone: If you already have an activated sim card, please directly insert to our phone and you are all set. If you are activating new sim card, please provide the IMEI number of your old phone or a smart phone to get the sim card activated. Then put the sim card back to our phone. It will automatically pick up the carrier's network after turning on Compatible Carriers: T-Mobile (Prepaid plan) SpeedTalk (Included in the Package): minimum cost only 5 USD per month, option for Port-in(Keep) your existing phone number or get a new phone number.Tello Mobile Ultra Mobile Metro by T-mobileMint Mobile Red PocketNot work with AT&T, or its MVNO such as Cricket, Pure TalkUSA, Consumer Cellular and H2O, etcNot for Any CDMA Network Carriers: Verizon, Sprint, Boost, PagePlus, U.S.Cellular etc.Do not activated new sim card on this phone or provide its IMEI numbers since most Carriers only recognize the phones they specify.

Product Specification : Cellular Technology: 4G LTE, 3G WCDMA, 2G GSM Applicable country: North and South American countries only Screen Size:1.77 inches + 2.4 inches HD IPS Camera: 2.0MP rear camera Talk Time &Standby Time:5 hours & 100 hours Battery: 1000 mAh Li-ion battery Speaker & Receiver:AAC 20*30 Box Speaker & AAC Receiver Sim Card Size: Nano size SD Card Slot: Support up to 32G Micro SD card(Not include) Bluetooth: Bluetooth V5.0 Phone Size: 4.09*2.08*0.82 inch Charging Port & Audio Jack: Micro USB 2.0 & 3.5mm Languages:English,French,Portuguese,Spanish,Italian,Deutsch Input Method: Abc input (Not support T9) Accessories: Speedtalk SIM Card*1, Battery*1, Charging Cable*1, Charging Dock*1, User Manual*1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EASY PHONE FOR SENIORS
reviews.reviewText: My husband is 87 year old and could not get used to a regular cell phone. This is a great phone for a senior personal. And the great thing is unlocked and works great en South America. Nice and clear!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not work with Metro Mobile
reviews.reviewText: Brought to Metro Mobile. They added the sim card and it was working fine when I left the store. About 10 minutes later it went into Emergency Calls Only mode. I was trying out the SOS button so i though I did something. Then I noticed there was a No Sim Card icon, and no network connection. I brought it back to Metro Mobile, they reset it, still did not work. They then called the corporate for help and they reset the network connection (what ever that is) and it still did not work. Ultimately told me it was not compatible with Metro Mobile (T-Mobile) network. Even though description on page says it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works Long Distance
reviews.reviewText: Carried It To Jamaica and It Worked Amazingly. Only thing is the battery dies a little fast but nothing too crazy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars This isn't the first complaint concerning the problem with this Ushining flip phone ..
reviews.reviewText: I activated the new SIM card that came with the flip phone. I got a confirmation email and a new number. I set up a monthly plan with speed talk and then things came to a direct halt. The phone wouldn't go past the emergency setting. No matter what we tried. Why is this still an issue if its Bern reported before? Don't waste peoples time . I have spent hours hoping to resolve this issue to no avail. Either fix it or take it down until its worth selling. This will also be returned ...Time wasted.....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy formatting and simple design. Works with major providers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DOES NOT WORK
reviews.reviewText: Don't waste your money on this phone. Despite setting up my account at SpeedTalk, with the provided SIM card and getting confirmation and receiving a new cell phone number, the phone will not work. It's in Emergency Call Only mode. It won't acknowledge the SIM card or connect to any network. I wasted two hours trying to get this to work and nothing. Very, very angry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love the appearance of this!It's big but not too big so you can't hold it, but it's big enough where you can spot it if it's dropped.The buttons are easy to see and push as well.It came with a Sim card, but the Sim card was expired.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Phone is NOT compatible with service provider as listed on USHINING site.
reviews.reviewText: This phone is appealing in appearance, and I really liked the SOS key on the back. However, when we tried to set up the phone, it was incompatible with the service provider (MINT).This is very frustrating!!To those who are seeking a phone that will work for the blind - this is not it!. There are no braille markings on the keys.
